titleStmt.title: The Memory of the just is blessed and is to be had in everlasting remembrance a most useful (pithy and deserved) commendation of (that pious and reverend minister of the gospel) Mr. Thomas Wadsworth, who changed this life for a better, October 29, 1676 : printed in meeter to perfume his name and keep alive his memory to future posterity.

The Memory of the just is blessed and is to be had in everlasting remembrance a most useful (pithy and deserved) commendation of (that pious and reverend minister of the gospel) Mr. Thomas Wadsworth, who changed this life for a better, October 29, 1676 : printed in meeter to perfume his name and keep alive his memory to future posterity.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
